properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 9:25PM CST until March 2 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Mississippi River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Mississippi River at Caruthersville
* until Sunday March 1.
* At 09 PM Tuesday the stage was 38.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring.
* Maximum forecast stage of 38.2 feet will be on Wednesday February 19.
* Flood stage is 32.0 feet.
* The river rose above flood stage Tuesday February 11 and will
continue rising to near 38.2 feet by Wednesday February 19. The
river will fall below flood stage Sunday March 1.
* At 38.0 feet...In Missouri, parking lots of casino in
Caruthersville, Missouri are flooding. Evacuation route from
residence inside levee near Cottonwood Point is shut. In Tennessee,
several homes in the Barr Point area will be cut off due to high
water. Road to the boat ramp near the mouth of the Obion River is
covered.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued Wednesday or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
